name: BlackHole Spam/Virus/address blocker
short_description:
Blackhole is a C program designed to stop spam and prevent unwanted senders
from sending you email. It is put in the .qmail file and will divert spam and
viruses to separate files which can be checked with an IMAP client if 
configured to do so. It no
